document.heading: Behavioral Health System of Care Amendment Act of 2014

history.narrative: Law 20-224, the “Behavioral Health System of Care Amendment Act of 2014,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 20-676. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on Nov. 18, 2014, and Dec. 2, 2014, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on Dec. 23, 2014, it was assigned Act No. 20-539 and transmitted to Congress for its review. D.C. Law 20-224 became effective on Mar. 11, 2015.
